elements.Text: Sometimes bags get misplaced at an airport, on a cruise ship, or at a hotel.  You should always make sure that your medicine is in a bag that you can access if you need it.  Never put your medicine in a back that you check or give to a company to transport for you.  Like your money, credit cards, and phone, medicines should always be kept in a carry-on bag, backpack, or purse, so that you can get them at any time.
